termsAndConditionsPage.subtitle: By logging into our system, you agree to the following terms and conditions

sections.heading: Login Terms & Conditions
items: Authentication: Users must provide accurate and truthful information. Unauthorized use of another person's credentials is strictly prohibited.
Responsibility: Users are responsible for all activities under their account and must keep your login credentials confidential.
Data Collection and Usage: By logging in, you consent to our collection and use of your personal data as outlined in our [Privacy Policy].
Data Protection: We will safeguard your information in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act B.E. 2562 (PDPA) and other applicable laws.
Account Suspension or Termination: If any violation of these terms is detected, the service provider reserves the right to suspend or terminate the account without prior notice.

sections.heading: Terms and Conditions (In-stock and Pre-order Items)

subsections.heading: 1) Delivery Time
items: Orders will be shipped within 1-3 business days after payment confirmation
A tracking number will be provided on the shipping date

subsections.heading: 2) Payment
items: Full payment is required before shipping
Cash on Delivery (COD) is not supported

subsections.heading: 3) Returns and Exchanges
items: Returns are only accepted in case of defects or incorrect items
Customers must notify us within 2 days of receipt

subsections.heading: 1) Product Description & Delivery Time
items: Items are sourced from South Korea and are not in local stock
Estimated delivery: 15-30 business days, excluding holidays

subsections.heading: 2) Payment Options
items: Depending on the item, two payment types are available:
Full payment: 100% upfront
Deposit option: 50% deposit required upon order
Remaining balance must be paid before domestic shipping (you will be notified)

subsections.heading: 3) Order Cancellation & Refunds
items: Orders cannot be canceled or refunded once placed
A full refund (including deposit) will be issued if the item becomes unavailable

subsections.heading: 4) Out-of-stock Items
items: If the item is no longer available from the supplier, customers may:
Request a full refund, or
Replace the item with a product of similar value

subsections.heading: 5) Product Quality Disclaimer
items: Minor manufacturing marks (e.g., loose threads or print marks) are considered acceptable and not eligible for return

subsections.heading: 6) Pricing
items: All prices include international shipping and import duties

sections.heading: General Conditions
items: Please verify your name and shipping address before completing payment
Customers are responsible for reshipping costs due to incorrect information
We are not liable for delays caused by customs clearance or third-party couriers
